messages.title: Welcome to PlayPalace 11.2.5
messages.message:
Welcome back to PlayPalace! Here's what's new:

  • Lobby Chat: Everyone not at a table can chat together while browsing games.
  • Poker Arrives: Five Card Draw and Texas Hold'em are ready to play.
  • Age of Heroes: Playable but still in progressâ€”let us know how it feels.

We value your feedback. Please share thoughts or issues by clicking the feedback button below.

Open feedback form
